I'm really glad the US can count on @autselfadvocacy or @thinkingautism for actual information about how Autism works.

1147641862775332865.text: As someone who has autism, I want her placed under arrested for a bare minimum of child endangerment and multiple counts of discrimination.

1147641450831605761.text: How do these dumb fucks still believe this shit? There is no evidence on their side, When they did their own study, it disproved their beliefs yet again. The doctor responsible for the first bogus study that started all this should be arrested for manslaughter,

1147639096631844869.text: She's an ableist fucking bigot who hates her son.

1147683867538493440.text: Allow me to add my own fuck you. I'm ON the spectrum. And while my own mother definitely had struggles raising me, she was never so GODDAMN ignorant as to try and turn what made me unique into a)a failure and b)project it via tinfoil hat onto something as important as immunizing.

1147659915877650432.text: I called her the c-word, but got suspended for it. Worth it.

1147680705260007424.text: Many people I love are on the autism spectrum and/or work in the medical field. So you can fuck right the hell off telling me whether or not I've skin in the game, pal.

1147687693809311744.text: It's a desperation, to grab onto something to explain away what they don't understand. I totally get that more than anything, but it's dangerous to try and prop up bunk science. It lends itself to attempting dangerous things to "cure" autism.

1147695932974292992.text: My Mom was very much the same way for a while, thinking my Aspergers was caused by vaccined

1147885274044784640.text: Thank you for not giving up

1147766277244706816.text: So you fought the good fight.pic.twitter.com/qBR58ALSkq

1147680936340938752.text: That‚Äôs her kid bro. Big difference. But I hear you.

1147692885736939520.text: Also, I need to point out that both my parents went into medical fields. They're both college graduates (hell, they MET in college) and are not typically brought into conspiracy theories or bunk science. But when it comes to their child, it was a blind spot.

1147758816483860480.text: Her kid that she is demonizing. Saying someone has no skin in the game is like walking past someone hitting their kid with a chair and saying "her kid, her choice." No, she's trash.

1147857307952472067.text: She is for the removal of herd immunity, it is not Just her kid

1147693535199748096.text: So don't write this off as something only uneducated people follow. That's a trap. ANYONE of ANY background can fall into this trap when emotionally compromised. I'm thankful my mom eventually conceded, because whenever I see shit like those people giving their kids bleach...pic.twitter.com/px0IYoShMm

1147694923178741761.text: I know it's weird to reference Camp Nowhere, but "just because you're smart doesn't mean you can't act stupid" has been a statement that I've always found myself coming back to, the older I get.
